  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">

  </h2>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">25</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">25</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="974194401344999424" id="stream-item-tweet-974194401344999424" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;974194401344999424&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

            </span>


      


    </div>

    </div>

    <div class="content">

    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I understand the agenda for todays JMC meeting in Downing Street has changed somewhat so that Carwyn Jones &amp; Nicola Sturgeon can be fully briefed on the Russia situation.</p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">From day one, <a href="/AMCarwyn" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2476761393"><s>@</s><b>AMCarwyn</b></a> and <a href="/WelshLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14496224"><s>@</s><b>WelshLabour</b></a> have led from the front to deliver a sensible <a href="/hashtag/Brexit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Brexit</b></a> that works for <a href="/hashtag/Wales?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Wales</b></a> and respects devolution <a href="/hashtag/StandingUpForWales?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>StandingUpForWales</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/WelshQuestions?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WelshQuestions</b></a></p>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton  js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-retweet-count-aria-973886582460764160">

      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>

    </div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">7</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="cy" data-aria-label-part="0">Pleased to take part in a debate on respite care and carers this evening / Falch o gymryd rhan mewn dadl ar ofal seibiant a gofalwyr heno.</p>
</div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">29</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/susanelanjones" data-user-id="3318714389">

      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">
        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Tories showing (yet again) that they dont understand devolution.   <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="971481811078598656" data-item-id="971481811078598656" data-permalink-path="/TriciaJones18/status/971481811078598656" data-conversation-id="971481811078598656" data-tweet-nonce="971481811078598656-5d24edeb-e9a4-4e22-95a8-95ad900963d3" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="971532738221264896" data-retweeter="susanelanjones" data-screen-name="TriciaJones18" data-name="Tricia Jones" data-user-id="584251356" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="susanelanjones UKParliament HouseofCommons" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;584251356&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;TriciaJones18&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Tricia Jones&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Tricia Jones&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Tricia Jones&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;3318714389&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;susanelanjones&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;6467332&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;UKParliament&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;UK Parliament&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;UK Parliament&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;UK Parliament&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;950249762&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;HouseofCommons&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;UK House of Commons&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;UK House of Commons&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;UK House of Commons&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">This was a well-informed Westminster Hall debate last night which discussed many of the current pressures on car insurance premiums. Particularly pleased to have <a href="/JennyChapman" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20856796"><s>@</s><b>JennyChapman</b></a>, <a href="/MattRodda" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="216516145"><s>@</s><b>MattRodda</b></a> and <a href="/susanelanjones" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3318714389"><s>@</s><b>susanelanjones</b></a> backing for graduated driver licensing <a href="/hashtag/GDL?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GDL</b></a> 
<a href="https://t.co/HuPJntMZ0d" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://hansard.parliament.uk/HoC%20Debate/2018-03-05/debates/8209EF41-487A-475C-9E6B-CB1A3B22FCA5/web/#contribution-5CDC32BB-F09C-43D9-9E1A-F3DEE136BEFF" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://hansard.parliament.uk/HoC%20Debate/2018-03-05/debates/8209EF41-487A-475C-9E6B-CB1A3B22FCA5/web/#contribution-5CDC32BB-F09C-43D9-9E1A-F3DEE136BEFF"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">hansard.parliament.uk/HoC%20Debate/2</span><span class="invisible">018-03-05/debates/8209EF41-487A-475C-9E6B-CB1A3B22FCA5/web/#contribution-5CDC32BB-F09C-43D9-9E1A-F3DEE136BEFF</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">A number of charities including <a href="/NCVO" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="19535210"><s>@</s><b>ncvo</b></a>, <a href="/ACEVO" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="41586247"><s>@</s><b>acevo</b></a>, <a href="/CharityRetail" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="358184666"><s>@</s><b>CharityRetail</b></a> are meeting with <a href="/DCMS" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18448883"><s>@</s><b>DCMS</b></a> and <a href="/ChtyCommission" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="82370383"><s>@</s><b>ChtyCommission</b></a> this morning to discuss how to strengthen and widen good practice on safeguarding. 

Many charities get this right. We want even more to.</p>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="970606221630812160" data-item-id="970606221630812160" data-permalink-path="/HoCpetitions/status/970606221630812160" data-conversation-id="970606221630812160" data-tweet-nonce="970606221630812160-56515849-2a61-4f83-9e0d-7873968e1996" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="970639946439708677" data-retweeter="susanelanjones" data-screen-name="HoCpetitions" data-name="Petitions Committee" data-user-id="3342596050" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="susanelanjones" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;3342596050&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;HoCpetitions&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Petitions Committee&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Petitions Committee&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Petitions Committee&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;3318714389&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;susanelanjones&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary_large_image" data-has-cards="true">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">But back in action! Nothing not even the weather stops our wonderful <a href="/LlangollenRail" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="89163778"><s>@</s><b>LlangollenRail</b></a>.   <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

</div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="969685879747989507" id="stream-item-tweet-969685879747989507" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;969685879747989507&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

The Brexit leavers promised cannot be delivered.<a href="https://t.co/gPTUFxxl57" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/gPTUFxxl57</a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Concerning to see someone trying to make a link between our local councillors making the economic case for a prison &amp; genocide. Its not a cliched analogy, its just plain offensive. The disturbing side of Twitter, sadly.<a href="https://t.co/jNtHTuEbNj" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/injusticedoc/status/969633309432172544" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/injusticedoc/status/969633309432172544"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/injusticedoc/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/969633309432172544</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Susan Elan Jones MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">I had to read this several times for it to sink in.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The PM wants working people to "face the fact" that the UK won't get everything it wants in negotiations. But she still refuses to level with them about what the losses will be.</p>

Fodd bynnag, nid oeddwn yn caniatu i brif weithredwr elusen o Lundain, Frances Cook, beirniadu ein cynghorwyr lleol am gefnogi rhywbeth sy'n dod  swyddi i'n hardal leol ni.           <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>

    <div class="dropdown">

      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">
        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The second <a href="/hashtag/petition?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>petition</b></a> debate on Monday is on changes to car insurance. It will be led by committee member <a href="/susanelanjones" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3318714389"><s>@</s><b>susanelanjones</b></a> Find out more:<a href="https://t.co/C1EF1COQJ5" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://goo.gl/8kfqaT" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://goo.gl/8kfqaT"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">goo.gl/8kfqaT</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Good to meet with representatives of Leonard Cheshire Wales <a href="/LCDcymru" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="836603410061344768"><s>@</s><b>LCDcymru</b></a> in Parliament today. Great discussion about <a href="/LCDcymru" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="836603410061344768"><s>@</s><b>LCDcymru</b></a> Dolywern. Diolch am ddod i San Steffan.<a href="https://t.co/8lvEvXUsYa" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/LCDcymru/status/968795675918991361" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/LCDcymru/status/968795675918991361"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/LCDcymru/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/968795675918991361</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Susan Elan Jones MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/LCDcymru/status/968795675918991361" data-conversation-id="968795675918991361" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="968795675918991361" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="LCDcymru" data-user-id="836603410061344768" href="/LCDcymru/status/968795675918991361" data-conversation-id="968795675918991361" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This is absolutely disgraceful. Have demanded an explanation as to why MoD has spent money that was promised to Forces charities.<a href="https://t.co/dV8TN5szV0" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/tnewtondunn/status/968619074380095488" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/tnewtondunn/status/968619074380095488"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/tnewtondunn/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/968619074380095488</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The first stage of the civil society strategy has launched today. <a href="/tracey_crouch" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="62613162"><s>@</s><b>tracey_crouch</b></a> and <a href="/DCMS" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18448883"><s>@</s><b>DCMS</b></a> would like to hear from anyone who is directly or indirectly part of the charity sector. A great opportunity for your voice to be heard. <a href="https://t.co/kL9Q4tQKxK" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-launches-call-for-evidence-for-civil-society-strategy" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-launches-call-for-evidence-for-civil-society-strategy"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">gov.uk/government/new</span><span class="invisible">s/government-launches-call-for-evidence-for-civil-society-strategy</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This is what we have been doing this afternoon.<a href="https://t.co/jDzRLO2ci6" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/CommonsWelshAff/status/968138594232733700" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/CommonsWelshAff/status/968138594232733700"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/CommonsWelshAf</span><span class="invisible">f/status/968138594232733700</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Susan Elan Jones MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">"Brexit is like giving up a three-course meal... for the promise of a packet of crisps in the future."

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Susan Elan Jones MP Retweeted Chris Musson</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Tory approach to devolution &amp; Brexit gets dafter by the day. On Wales/Eng border, we share hospitals so pretty sure co-operation on organ donations will continue! But what the heck has that got to do with repatriating powers re: agriculture (the real issue Tories wont address)?<a href="https://t.co/OiBcFAtBpH" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/camusson/status/968125641223786496" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/camusson/status/968125641223786496"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/camusson/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/968125641223786496</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Lidington: "We will need to continue to work together on important domestic policy areas. For example ensuring a vital organ that is donated by someone in one part of the UK can still be used in a transplant to treat a patient in another part of the UK."</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Think we need special Ladybird books to explain things to Tories. Agriculture is devolved to Wales. Anything that repatriates EU powers over agriculture to Westminster not Wales not good for devolution.<a href="https://t.co/jhs3PsCDxv" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-wales-politics-43192574" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-wales-politics-43192574"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.co.uk/news/uk-wales-</span><span class="invisible">politics-43192574</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


      

      
        


      
          <div class="card2 js-media-container&#10;    " data-card2-name="summary_large_image">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0"><a href="/hashtag/Labour?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Labour</b></a> right to say that, if we <a href="/hashtag/brexit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>brexit</b></a>, we need to stay in a <a href="/hashtag/CustomsUnion?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>CustomsUnion</b></a> with EU. Not just vital for <a href="/hashtag/trade?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>trade</b></a> with EU (&amp; to avoid hard border in NI), but also for <a href="/hashtag/Trade?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Trade</b></a> with rest of world: the many existing deals we negotiated as Europe, rather than separately, shld be kept!</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Susan Elan Jones MP Retweeted Clwyd South Labour</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Very informative article by Brymbo Community Councillor Zoe Clarke <a href="/Armaita100" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2363157426"><s>@</s><b>Armaita100</b></a> <a href="/ClwydSouthLab" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2887527923"><s>@</s><b>ClwydSouthLab</b></a><a href="https://t.co/NIZogUQsC8" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/ClwydSouthLab/status/966937340559216640" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/ClwydSouthLab/status/966937340559216640"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/ClwydSouthLab/</span><span class="invisible">status/966937340559216640</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="966937340559216640" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="ClwydSouthLab" data-user-id="2887527923" href="/ClwydSouthLab/status/966937340559216640" data-conversation-id="966937340559216640" tabindex="0">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">For those of us just about old enough to have seen Bob Paisley &amp; Liverpool FC play charity cricket in Brymbo, this ones for a new generation of cricketers! Great opportunities with <a href="/BrymboCCJnrs" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="4107238348"><s>@</s><b>BrymboCCJnrs</b></a><a href="https://t.co/VctrWGmpyc" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/BrymboCCJnrs/status/966778950541283328" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/BrymboCCJnrs/status/966778950541283328"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/BrymboCCJnrs/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/966778950541283328</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

Thursday, 01.03.18
12:45 outside Guild Hall

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/NFUPolitical" data-user-id="569286383">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Glad <a href="/susanelanjones" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3318714389"><s>@</s><b>susanelanjones</b></a> is sticking up for farmers in Wales. Shame though that PM had to finish the same way she started <a href="/hashtag/PMQs?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PMQs</b></a> - with a shameful non-answer.</p>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Susan Elan Jones MP Retweeted Jo Stevens</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Indeed. Would also be thoroughly stupid. Charity Commission must have credibility and be seen to have credibility at this critical time for the voluntary sector.<a href="https://t.co/ObJw7diwiS" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/JoStevensLabour/status/966246031439646720" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/JoStevensLabour/status/966246031439646720"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/JoStevensLabou</span><span class="invisible">r/status/966246031439646720</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Susan Elan Jones MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/JoStevensLabour/status/966246031439646720" data-conversation-id="966246031439646720" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="966246031439646720" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="JoStevensLabour" data-user-id="1328897358" href="/JoStevensLabour/status/966246031439646720" data-conversation-id="966246031439646720" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Jo Stevens</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>JoStevensLabour</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Yesterday our cross party <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1002084811"><s>@</s><b>CommonsCMS</b></span> listened to Tory Peer Tina Stowell &amp; unanimously decided she should not be appointed to chair the Charity Commission. If the govt are ignoring our decision, its a disgraceful politically partisan move <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.thirdsector.co.uk/government-appoint-baroness-stowell-chair-regulator-despite-mps-concerns/governance/article/1457637" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.thirdsector.co.uk/government-appoint-baroness-stowell-chair-regulator-despite-mps-concerns/governance/article/1457637"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">thirdsector.co.uk/government-app</span><span class="invisible">oint-baroness-stowell-chair-regulator-despite-mps-concerns/governance/article/1457637</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>
        </div>
      </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Susan Elan Jones MP Retweeted ITV Wales News</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="cy" data-aria-label-part="4">Enough is enough. If we are serious about animal welfare, its time Police got proper powers to test dog DNA. These attacks are a menace in our rural areas/ 
Os ydym yn ddifrifol ynghylch lles anifeiliaid mewn ardaloedd gwledig, mae angen rhoi pwerau ychwanegol i'r Heddlu.<a href="https://t.co/FfTlqvgEFr" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/ITVWales/status/966215149433643009" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/ITVWales/status/966215149433643009"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/ITVWales/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/966215149433643009</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Susan Elan Jones MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Bore da 
Good morning

Big day for us today with the release of the National Livestock attack report that we have been part of.

Just been on Radio Wales and the BBC are featuring the story on their UK news.

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Susan Elan Jones MP Retweeted Penley Rainbow</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Great job opportunities with the wonderful <a href="/penleyrainbow" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="429796828"><s>@</s><b>penleyrainbow</b></a> . Also delighted to hear that the minibus fundraising target has been met (very much enjoyed my pre Christmas visit). Newyddion gwych o Benle.<a href="https://t.co/itZUKETFsP" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/penleyrainbow/status/965563743768842242" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/penleyrainbow/status/965563743768842242"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/penleyrainbow/</span><span class="invisible">status/965563743768842242</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Susan Elan Jones MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/penleyrainbow/status/965563743768842242" data-conversation-id="965563743768842242" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="965563743768842242" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="penleyrainbow" data-user-id="429796828" href="/penleyrainbow/status/965563743768842242" data-conversation-id="965563743768842242" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Penley Rainbow</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>penleyrainbow</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">CURRENT VACANCIES:

The Rainbow Centre are looking to recruit Community Agent/s
for a new Community Wellbeing... <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://fb.me/TWa5Omwy" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://fb.me/TWa5Omwy"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">fb.me/TWa5Omwy</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Interesting debate on <a href="/BBCr4today" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="8170292"><s>@</s><b>BBCr4today</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/TuitionFees?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>TuitionFees</b></a> debate is needed, as is need for real maintenance support for students. <a href="/Andrew_Adonis" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="420366322"><s>@</s><b>Andrew_Adonis</b></a> right to support devolved differences. <a href="/WelshLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14496224"><s>@</s><b>WelshLabour</b></a> Gov't leading way on providing real support for students.</p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="cy" data-aria-label-part="4">General victory for Clwyd South constituency in <a href="/NthEastWales" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="259795238"><s>@</s><b>NthEastWales</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/NEWFood?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NEWFood</b></a> cook off! Congratulations to Gales Llangollen, <a href="/TheRoyalOak" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="574741364"><s>@</s><b>TheRoyalOak</b></a> Bangor-on-Dee &amp; the Wrexham entrant. Llongyfarchiadau mawr.<a href="https://t.co/ugtWP0zYWC" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/ThisIsWrexham/status/964796060366462976" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/ThisIsWrexham/status/964796060366462976"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/ThisIsWrexham/</span><span class="invisible">status/964796060366462976</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Susan Elan Jones MP added,</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Having campaigned with many constituents, I am in no doubt that the situation facing women born in the 1950s relating to their pension situation is a grave injustice. Please watch this excellent programme about it.<a href="https://t.co/dUqOfmKsw8" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.itv.com/walesprogrammes/wales-this-week" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.itv.com/walesprogrammes/wales-this-week"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">itv.com/walesprogramme</span><span class="invisible">s/wales-this-week</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

Worst possible way to stoke it is to pretend Brexit will deliver things it cant - which is what Johnson is doing.

We have no choice but to be honest about Brexit. 

It will damage us.</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">NWP Wrexham Rural Retweeted Oswestry Advertizer</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4"><a href="/hashtag/NWPolice?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NWPolice</b></a> are asking for any witnesses to a accident that occurred at Bronywaun/Churchview <a href="/hashtag/Chirk?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Chirk</b></a> on Friday 9th February 2018. Please contact 101 quoting ref- RC18016411 asking for officer PC3157. Thanks <a href="/hashtag/pcsodean?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>pcsodean</b></a><a href="https://t.co/fVORKV1Z7c" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/advertizer/status/963007168881491969" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/advertizer/status/963007168881491969"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/advertizer/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/963007168881491969</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">David Hanson Retweeted Sue Hayman</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">New policy document launched today - some issues are devolved to wales and the welsh labour government has implemented already but this is a good guide to overall uk policy on animal welfare<a href="https://t.co/94oO4p4pql" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/suehayman1/status/963703597702709249" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/suehayman1/status/963703597702709249"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/suehayman1/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/963703597702709249</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">David Hanson added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/SueHayman1/status/963703597702709249" data-conversation-id="963703597702709249" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="963703597702709249" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="SueHayman1" data-user-id="580947925" href="/SueHayman1/status/963703597702709249" data-conversation-id="963703597702709249" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Sue Hayman</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>SueHayman1</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Today we launch Labour's 50 point Animal Welfare Plan and we want YOUR views. Our ideas include banning the live export of animals for slaughter, ending the badger cull, giving tenants the right to keep a pet and strengthening the Hunting Act. <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://labour.org.uk/issues/animal-welfare-plan/" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://labour.org.uk/issues/animal-welfare-plan/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">labour.org.uk/issues/animal-</span><span class="invisible">welfare-plan/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="cy" data-aria-label-part="0">Mae hwn yn benderfyniad ardderchog gan Lywodraeth Llafur Cymru. Ni fydd datblygwyr mwyach yn gallu cerdded i ffwrdd o ddatblygiadau hanner gorffen fel yr un yn Heol Berwyn, Cefn Mawr. Bydd y mesur hwn yn cael ei groesawu yn fy etholaeth i ac ar draws Cymru<a href="https://t.co/zKjlcjHeEL" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.co.uk/cymrufyw/43035255" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.co.uk/cymrufyw/43035255"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.co.uk/cymrufyw/43035</span><span class="invisible">255</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">This is an excellent decision by the <a href="/WelshLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14496224"><s>@</s><b>WelshLabour</b></a> Government.         <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">When you lot representing the protectionists in the Tories &amp; UKIP realise that many of our so-called leafy suburbs are in fact farming areas &amp; working-class communities whose economies would be wrecked if we just sat back &amp; let you get on with your No Deal Brexit nonsense.</p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Happy 86th birthday to Dennis Skinner MP a true socialist&amp;an amazing MP who inspired me to get into politics. So glad l have had the chance to serve in parliament with Dennis who has remained true to his cause from the very first day he was elected in 1970, long may he continue.<a href="https://t.co/B6bQtwULpH" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/B6bQtwULpH</a></p>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">5</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

  </div>

  </div>

</div>
  



      
      

      

      

    </div>

  </div>

  <div class="dismissed-module">
    <div class="feedback-actions">
        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Today Ive taken part in a parliamentary debate on banking. The UK Govt has failed to stop bank branch closures, but will Govt step in to save free-to-use ATM cashpoints &amp; also support community banking ideas like those Corwen Town Council &amp; local businesses have? Govt should act</p>
</div>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Susan Elan Jones MP Retweeted RuralCrimeTeam</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This is an aspect of rural life that is rarely discussed. Thank you to North Wales Police <a href="/NWPRuralCrime" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1944251742"><s>@</s><b>NWPRuralCrime</b></a> for sharing the photo. Now we need suggestions from Police &amp; others re: how we can use the Law to stop this sort of thing happening.<a href="https://t.co/4QAGy6vO3E" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/NWPRuralCrime/status/961351304709918720" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/NWPRuralCrime/status/961351304709918720"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/NWPRuralCrime/</span><span class="invisible">status/961351304709918720</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Susan Elan Jones MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

            <div class="QuoteMedia">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">As a team we made the decision to expose the harsh reality of livestock attacks and we were the first to do so.

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="cy" data-aria-label-part="4">Mae hyn yn ochr i fywyd gwledig nad yw'n cael ei drafod yn aml. Diolch i Heddlu Gogledd Cymru <a href="/NWPRuralCrime" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1944251742"><s>@</s><b>NWPRuralCrime</b></a> am rannu'r ffotograff hwn. Angen rwan ir Heddlu ac eraill awgrymu sut y gallwn ddefnyddio'r gyfraith i atal y math hwn o beth ddigwydd.<a href="https://t.co/4QAGy6vO3E" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/NWPRuralCrime/status/961351304709918720" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/NWPRuralCrime/status/961351304709918720"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/NWPRuralCrime/</span><span class="invisible">status/961351304709918720</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Labour <a href="/susanelanjones" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3318714389"><s>@</s><b>susanelanjones</b></a> wonders what Newsnight producers or Guardian journalists make of MPs happily using Welsh. Why do progressive journalists stand up for every minority language and culture and denigrate ours, she asks.</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Our sense of community here in Alyn &amp; Deeside taught me the values by which I stand today. 

I want us to go forward with a commitment to a new kind of politics and life in general - built on fairness, justice and above all, kindness to one another.

<a href="/hashtag/AlynandDeeside?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>AlynandDeeside</b></a></p>
</div>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">10</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">2</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="960532600510181376" id="stream-item-tweet-960532600510181376" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;960532600510181376&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="960083208741294080" data-item-id="960083208741294080" data-permalink-path="/susanelanjones/status/960083208741294080" data-conversation-id="960083208741294080" data-tweet-nonce="960083208741294080-b7646861-1225-4018-b763-3e76a21a62eb" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="susanelanjones" data-name="Susan Elan Jones MP" data-user-id="3318714389" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;3318714389&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;susanelanjones&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary_large_image" data-has-cards="true">

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/susanelanjones" data-user-id="3318714389">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="958133794153824264" id="stream-item-tweet-958133794153824264" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;958133794153824264&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="958463743171661824" data-item-id="958463743171661824" data-permalink-path="/MirrorPolitics/status/958463743171661824" data-conversation-id="958463743171661824" data-tweet-nonce="958463743171661824-0d62bced-ac43-4e84-9967-1dd574cc1688" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="958468050340188165" data-retweeter="susanelanjones" data-screen-name="MirrorPolitics" data-name="Mirror Politics" data-user-id="130138925" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;130138925&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;MirrorPolitics&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Mirror Politics&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Mirror Politics&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Mirror Politics&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;3318714389&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;susanelanjones&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

      <span class="Icon Icon--small Icon--retweeted"></span>



            <span class="js-retweet-text">

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Thank you to all the MPs who spoke out for animals in yesterday's debate in Parliament on fireworks and to <a href="/susanelanjones" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3318714389"><s>@</s><b>susanelanjones</b></a> for leading it <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f63a.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Smiling cat face with open mouth" aria-label="Emoji: Smiling cat face with open mouth" /></p>

          </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Susan Elan Jones MP Retweeted NWP Wrexham Rural</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Communities House in Brynteg does wonderful work &amp; this is an appalling, cowardly attack on our community. Hope charges pressed against perpetrators very soon indeed.<a href="https://t.co/jveosxhNU4" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/NWPWrexhamRural/status/957297954590806016" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/NWPWrexhamRural/status/957297954590806016"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/NWPWrexhamRura</span><span class="invisible">l/status/957297954590806016</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Susan Elan Jones MP added,</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Susan Elan Jones MP Retweeted Petitions Committee</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Very pleased to be leading this parliamentary debate on Monday as a member of the House of Commons Petitions Committee <a href="/HoCpetitions" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3342596050"><s>@</s><b>HoCpetitions</b></a>. Great we have also have interactive comments <a href="https://t.co/iLf3cmRYug" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://m.facebook.com/UKHouseofCommons/photos/a.183499548715839.1073741828.183432182055909/539364629795994/?type=3&amp;theater" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://m.facebook.com/UKHouseofCommons/photos/a.183499548715839.1073741828.183432182055909/539364629795994/?type=3&amp;theater"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">m.facebook.com/UKHouseofCommo</span><span class="invisible">ns/photos/a.183499548715839.1073741828.183432182055909/539364629795994/?type=3&amp;theater</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/1tAq4moCky" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/HoCpetitions/status/956904179536195585" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/HoCpetitions/status/956904179536195585"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/HoCpetitions/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/956904179536195585</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Susan Elan Jones MP added,</p>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
        <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedVideo" data-nav="embed_video">
          <button type="button" class="dropdown-link"> Embed Video</button>
        </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">We invited people to witness footage of powerful words, used both for good and evil, to explore <a href="/hashtag/ThePowerOfWords?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ThePowerOfWords</b></a> - the theme of <a href="/hashtag/HolocaustMemorialDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>HolocaustMemorialDay</b></a> 2018. Please watch and share a film every day in the run up to HMD, and our main film on Friday 26 January.<a href="https://t.co/RFRPtcPwxV" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/RFRPtcPwxV</a></p>

  </div>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Susan Elan Jones MP Retweeted Inst. of Fundraising</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Thanks to the Institute of Fundraising <a href="/IoFtweets" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="74446785"><s>@</s><b>IoFtweets</b></a> for this. We have a superb voluntary sector in our country. Charities dont need more red tape. What we do need is for existing laws &amp; Charity Commission powers to be applied against the organisers of this appalling event.<a href="https://t.co/3RTS03GRTY" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/IoFtweets/status/956108734689959938" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/IoFtweets/status/956108734689959938"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/IoFtweets/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/956108734689959938</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Susan Elan Jones MP added,</p>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">12</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Comment from the National Council for Voluntary Organisations <a href="/NCVO" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="19535210"><s>@</s><b>NCVO</b></a> is exactly right.<a href="https://t.co/PNtWnv3z7Y" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/NCVO/status/956113392611352577" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/NCVO/status/956113392611352577"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/NCVO/status/95</span><span class="invisible">6113392611352577</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Susan Elan Jones MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/NCVO/status/956113392611352577" data-conversation-id="956113392611352577" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="956113392611352577" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="NCVO" data-user-id="19535210" href="/NCVO/status/956113392611352577" data-conversation-id="956113392611352577" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">

  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Our reaction to the <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PresidentsClub</b></span> charity fundraising event reported on by <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18949452"><s>@</s><b>FT</b></span> last night, from <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1128617106"><s>@</s><b>ncvoliz</b></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/rXvPO0UAoC</span></div>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

    </div>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">3</span>
  </span>

  </button>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">13</span>
  </span>

  </button>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Sad to report another sheep attack, with 2 dead in a stream having been brutalised.

This happened at Pontfadog, Ceiriog Valley near Chirk.

Occurred between 13th &amp; 14th January.

Any info call 101.

(Feel like a stuck record)<a href="https://t.co/Op7GOQxXjr" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Op7GOQxXjr</a></p>
</div>

  <div class="dismissed-module">
    <div class="feedback-actions">
        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Otherwise good <a href="/guardian" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="87818409"><s>@</s><b>guardian</b></a> piece on multi-lingualism impaired by lack of understanding re Wales. Welsh language not identified with an independence movement. Modern Wales is dIverse, devolved, bi-lingual - when will liberal commentariat catch up with us?<a href="https://t.co/sqFfYbIgZe" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2018/jan/21/the-joys-and-benefits-of-bilingualism" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2018/jan/21/the-joys-and-benefits-of-bilingualism"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">theguardian.com/commentisfree/</span><span class="invisible">2018/jan/21/the-joys-and-benefits-of-bilingualism</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Important intervention from the CBI. Labour will push govt. to secure Brexit transitional arrangements urgently &amp; to put a Customs Union back on the negotiating table for the long term.<a href="https://t.co/d7Z5CDTpvo" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.cbi.org.uk/news/evidence-not-ideology-why-a-customs-union-is-best-for-britain/" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.cbi.org.uk/news/evidence-not-ideology-why-a-customs-union-is-best-for-britain/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">cbi.org.uk/news/evidence-</span><span class="invisible">not-ideology-why-a-customs-union-is-best-for-britain/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

Well now their own supporters are admitting it wasn't true. <a href="/hashtag/Brexit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Brexit</b></a><a href="https://t.co/VapykyRvOu" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/VapykyRvOu</a></p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="954398114944835584" data-item-id="954398114944835584" data-permalink-path="/susanelanjones/status/954398114944835584" data-conversation-id="954398114944835584" data-tweet-nonce="954398114944835584-7ba5d950-f163-4394-ae93-615af86a4f34" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="susanelanjones" data-name="Susan Elan Jones MP" data-user-id="3318714389" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="NWPRuralCrime" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;3318714389&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;susanelanjones&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;1944251742&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;NWPRuralCrime&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;RuralCrimeTeam\u2122&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;RuralCrimeTeam\u2122&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;RuralCrimeTeam\u2122&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

Can Penycae residents (or anyone else) please help Police catch whoever did this crime? See <a href="/NWPRuralCrime" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1944251742"><s>@</s><b>NWPRuralCrime</b></a> tweet for details of telephone no that you can call confidentially<a href="https://t.co/vF5qXJ9Hxn" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/NWPRuralCrime/status/953967919268089857" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/NWPRuralCrime/status/953967919268089857"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/NWPRuralCrime/</span><span class="invisible">status/953967919268089857</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">At mtg I had last month, <a href="/PostOffice" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="96966644"><s>@</s><b>PostOffice</b></a> assured me they are committed to free-to-use cashpoint ATMs. Banks wont do similar. UK Govt needs to be firm with them - or this will be worse than bank branch closure programme. Esp bad news for our rural communities<a href="https://t.co/Ormc7YKPzm" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-42741465" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-42741465"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.co.uk/news/business-</span><span class="invisible">42741465</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/susanelanjones" data-user-id="3318714389">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="953970002213908481" data-item-id="953970002213908481" data-permalink-path="/RCorbettMEP/status/953970002213908481" data-conversation-id="953970002213908481" data-tweet-nonce="953970002213908481-65344b28-7271-4ffd-8b69-23fbd7388e58" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="954014220043128835" data-retweeter="susanelanjones" data-screen-name="RCorbettMEP" data-name="Richard Corbett" data-user-id="1347250338" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="LabourList" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;1347250338&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;RCorbettMEP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Richard Corbett&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Richard Corbett&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Richard Corbett&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;3318714389&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;susanelanjones&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;18874097&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;LabourList&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;LabourList&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;LabourList&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;LabourList&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary" data-has-cards="true">

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweet</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Elliw Gwawr added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="953647928329072640" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="susanelanjones" data-user-id="3318714389" href="/susanelanjones/status/953647928329072640" data-conversation-id="953647928329072640" tabindex="0">

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Susan Elan Jones MP</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>susanelanjones</b></span>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">For anyone who thought the UK's Government blue passports stunt was about patriotism - Govt won't support bilingual passports for residents who live in Wales. See my parliamentary question below: 
Susan Elan Jones on Home Office, at TheyWorkForYou </div>

  <div class="ProfileTweet-actionList js-actions" role="group" aria-label="Tweet actions">
    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--reply">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionReply" data-modal="ProfileTweet-reply" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-reply-count-aria-953650070272069632">
