        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
      </span>
  </button>
</div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">

  </span>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">2</span>

  </button>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Congratulations to <a href="/NWPRuralCrime" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1944251742"><s>@</s><b>NWPRuralCrime</b></a> and <a href="/RSPCA_official" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="15288851"><s>@</s><b>RSPCA_official</b></a> for all they do to bring cases like this one to Court.           <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Susan Elan Jones MP Retweeted Open Doors UK </p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="cy" data-aria-label-part="4">Very pleased to be attending this meeting in Parliament today hosted by religious freedom organisation <a href="/OpenDoorsUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="224967068"><s>@</s><b>OpenDoorsUK</b></a> / Byddwn yn mynd ir cyfarfod  yn San Steffan pnawn ma.<a href="https://t.co/vymL5SlYYy" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/OpenDoorsUK/status/953307723285790720" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/OpenDoorsUK/status/953307723285790720"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/OpenDoorsUK/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/953307723285790720</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Susan Elan Jones MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/OpenDoorsUK/status/953307723285790720" data-conversation-id="953307010870673408" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="953307723285790720" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="OpenDoorsUK" data-user-id="224967068" href="/OpenDoorsUK/status/953307723285790720" data-conversation-id="953307010870673408" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">

  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">We must speak out against persecution like this.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">It is unacceptable that the UK Government is ignoring the power of devolved governments over devolved areas in a blatant power grab. 
They know theyve made a mistake but they wont admit it. <a href="/hashtag/Clause11?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Clause11</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/EUwithdrawalbill?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>EUwithdrawalbill</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/Devolution?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Devolution</b></a><a href="https://t.co/9BmGFG60XF" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/9BmGFG60XF</a></p>

  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">TSSA</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>TSSAunion</b></span>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Only Jeremy Corbyn could keep Britain in a reformed EU
The leader of the TSSA union, <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="344141508"><s>@</s><b>Manuel_TSSA</b></span>, argues <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="117777690"><s>@</s><b>jeremycorbyn</b></span> could keep Britain in the <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>EU</b></span>
<span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bit.ly/MirrorMC2ndrefoped" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://bit.ly/MirrorMC2ndrefoped"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bit.ly/MirrorMC2ndref</span><span class="invisible">oped</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/aQu0mAo8P7</span></div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Frances O'Grady Retweeted Red Box</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">The single market is the only realistic option that guarantees our rights at work long-term. Me for <a href="/thetimes" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="6107422"><s>@</s><b>thetimes</b></a> this morning.<a href="https://t.co/2LQZ8S042C" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/timesredbox/status/953187358542909440" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/timesredbox/status/953187358542909440"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/timesredbox/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/953187358542909440</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Frances O'Grady added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/timesredbox/status/953187358542909440" data-conversation-id="953187358542909440" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="953187358542909440" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="timesredbox" data-user-id="2709717300" href="/timesredbox/status/953187358542909440" data-conversation-id="953187358542909440" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Susan Elan Jones MP Retweeted Labour Defence</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Defence Secretarys responses shockingly inept. Last Thursday, MPs across the House spoke powerfully in support of our armed forces. They deserve better than to be represented at Cabinet level by Theresa Mays mouth-piece.<a href="https://t.co/GJGpyvc7F4" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/LabourDefence/status/952928307288379392" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/LabourDefence/status/952928307288379392"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/LabourDefence/</span><span class="invisible">status/952928307288379392</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Susan Elan Jones MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/LabourDefence/status/952928307288379392" data-conversation-id="952928307288379392" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="952928307288379392" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="LabourDefence" data-user-id="1947101936" href="/LabourDefence/status/952928307288379392" data-conversation-id="952928307288379392" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Labour Defence</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>LabourDefence</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">The way the Defence Secretary talks about threats and the rumoured proposed cuts simply do not match up. Lets be clear <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NSCR</b></span> is about trying to correct Tory defence spending mistakes at the expense of our capabilities.</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Tory approach is not just unduly partisan; it also shows no understanding of NE Wales border area. Countess of Chester Hosp &amp; orthopaedic hosp in Gobowen <a href="https://t.co/Pnf8pjYMm6" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.rjah.nhs.uk/About-Us/Hospital-History.aspx" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.rjah.nhs.uk/About-Us/Hospital-History.aspx"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">rjah.nhs.uk/About-Us/Hospi</span><span class="invisible">tal-History.aspx</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> were created to serve patients on both sides of border. Wrexham Maelor hosp sees English patients etc<a href="https://t.co/oWRbPeisjA" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/ToniaAntoniazzi/status/952640323997650945" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/ToniaAntoniazzi/status/952640323997650945"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/ToniaAntoniazz</span><span class="invisible">i/status/952640323997650945</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Lets be clear on facts: as <a href="/The_TUC" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="48315339"><s>@</s><b>The_TUC</b></a> and others have said, you don't have to be in EU to be in the Single Market (see Iceland, Norway etc.); leaving it wasnt on the ballot paper; we can change our mind on any / all of the issues around <a href="/hashtag/Brexit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Brexit</b></a> in any case. Please RT.</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Holly Lynch MP Retweeted ITV News Central</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">MPs cannot influence the judiciary, we can only change the law. That is why the new <a href="/hashtag/ProtectTheProtectors?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ProtectTheProtectors</b></a> bill was necessary, because this is unacceptable. If they will not use their existing powers to reflect the seriousness of attacks like this, then we must legislate to do it.<a href="https://t.co/gTPcnWORZd" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/itvcentral/status/951859183783170048" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/itvcentral/status/951859183783170048"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/itvcentral/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/951859183783170048</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="951223692452917249" data-item-id="951223692452917249" data-permalink-path="/susanelanjones/status/951223692452917249" data-conversation-id="951223692452917249" data-tweet-nonce="951223692452917249-773a1108-33eb-4bc3-a7df-31a1354e8419" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="susanelanjones" data-name="Susan Elan Jones MP" data-user-id="3318714389" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="JayneOzanne" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;3318714389&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;susanelanjones&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;1726117429&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;JayneOzanne&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Jayne Ozanne&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Jayne Ozanne&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Jayne Ozanne&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/susanelanjones" data-user-id="3318714389">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="949918383184732160" data-item-id="949918383184732160" data-permalink-path="/susanelanjones/status/949918383184732160" data-conversation-id="949918383184732160" data-tweet-nonce="949918383184732160-86edff70-bb00-458f-b344-47470fb6130f" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="susanelanjones" data-name="Susan Elan Jones MP" data-user-id="3318714389" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;3318714389&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;susanelanjones&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Susan Elan Jones MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary_large_image" data-has-cards="true">

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/susanelanjones" data-user-id="3318714389">
